name: Project -9.81
description:
Project -9.81 is a sci-fi puzzle based game; incorporating physics based mechanics and space elements in complex puzzles. You are the subject of a test discovering the elements of space and time. Progress through the testing by solving each of the challenges presented, with each challenge becoming increasingly difficult. The elements being tested are:

Reverse Time

Slow Down Time

Ignis Orbs

Etheric Transferer
